Reviews.Title: A very nice point & shoot.
Reviews.Author: Happily Retired
Reviews.Content: It fits the needs of my wife, who I bought it for a Christmas gift. It recycles fast, gives decent picture  results. Small & compact. The camera does have numerous settings  for various conditions you may want to snap a pic and an ISO from 100 to 26800, believe it or not.!! White balance setting and many more. Her favorite color is Pink so I couldn't go wrong in my selection. Price was right.  She is usually happy about the decisions I make and agrees with them. Yes, I know, there have been times when the dirty looks appear, but it's not that often. I researched the camera to what I thought her likes & dislikes would be and I think she'll be happy.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.2 megapixels
5X optical zoom
2.7-inch LCD
Full HD 1080/60i with dual record of stills and movies
Picture Effect for more expressive photos
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX50 16.2 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-inch LCD (New Model) Pink
